title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 November 2014 - XWiki
content:

11:12 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
11:13 <Lyes> has quit

11:18 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
11:43 <Lyes> has quit  
11:49 <Lyes> has joined #xwiki  
12:00 <silviar> has quit  
12:07 <Enygma`> any idea why this http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-5.4.x/52/consoleFull is marked as failed?  
12:07 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
12:12 <tmortagne> Enygma`: we talked about it with vmassol some time ago, it seems to be a bug in the Groovy Postbuild plugin probably caused by the upgrade  
12:12 <tmortagne> might be indirectly caused because there is exceptions in the log  
12:13 <tmortagne> (i.e. the groovy script match it and them crash for some reason)  
12:15 <silviar> has quit  
12:19 <vmassol> Enygma`: IMO it's caused by the jenkins upgrade  
12:19 <vmassol> 2 solutions:  
12:19 <vmassol> 1) best one: roll back the upgrade as it was before  
12:19 <vmassol> 2) try to upgrade the plugin  
12:19 <vmassol> personally I'm not going to touch the jenkins install anymore  
12:20 <vmassol> I spent too much time working on it  
12:20 <vmassol> and setting the proper versions of everything  
12:20 <vmassol> and it was ruined by the upgrade  
12:29 <tmortagne> 2) is quicker, we could at least try that since everything else seems to work well  
12:34 <tmortagne> has quit  
12:38 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
12:42 <tekzilla> has quit  
12:42 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
12:47 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
12:59 <vmassol> thanks msmeria1  
13:00 <msmeria1> vmassol: you're welcome :)  
13:00 <msmeria1> is now known as <msmeria>  
13:07 <silviar> has quit  
13:10 <Enygma`> well, ci.xwiki.org is a bit sluggish at times. Not sure if it was like that before the upgrade as well, though it could have been a bit.  
13:11 <silviar> has joined #xwiki  
13:13 <Enygma`> and about the script, can`t we update it to also print out the failing rule, so we can easily identify what made a build fail?  
13:30 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
13:51 <tmortagne> has left #xwiki
